original_text: They were not estranged from their lust. But while their meat was yet in their mouths,
korean_text: 그러나 그들이 그들의 욕심을 버리지 아니하여 그들의 먹을 것이 아직 그들의 입에 있을 때에

sentences.original_text: They were not estranged from their lust
But while their meat was yet in their mouths
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들의 고기가 아직 입에 있는 동안
